Body: I want to install a new Android version in my Ubislate 7C+ EDGE Tablet. It has wi-fi, 3G Network support, 10 point touch screen, inbuilt SIM card slot, 4Gb internal memory and 512Mb of RAM, and a 7in screen with 800x600 resolution support.I don't have even the basic idea of how to start (I'm a novice), so please  start from the start. Please explain complete process step-by-step, and don't skip even the tiniest of details (connections, OS details, architecture, etc.), keywords, etc...I am also unable to find any proper link to download android 4.2 for tablets, please refer sites or links.
Title: How to upgrade or remove and install a new Android OS in Ubislate 7C+ Tablet
